div.p: Valid response codes are shown in the following table. Additional response codes (e.g. 5xx server error) may also be encountered.

Diagnostic implications for familial hypercholesterolemia? (This query seeks to determine if the subject has any diagnostic implications of familial hypercholesterolemia that are derived from any variant present in the subject).
Diagnostic implications for variant X or variant Y? (This query seeks to determine if the subject has any diagnostic implications whatsoever that are derived from variant X or variant Y).

Patient HG00403 has a germline variant in the RYR1 gene (NC_000019.10:38499669:C:T). What are the diagnostic implications of this variant? (Results indicate that the variant is pathogenic for Malignant Hyperthermia).
